FuncDef: This command configures the value of the Rapid Retransmission Interval. It is used in the re-transmission mechanism to handle unacknowledged message_id objects and is based on an exponential back-off timer.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the Rapid Retransmission Interval, in units of 100 ms (for example, enter "6" for a 600 ms retransmit time). Values-1 to 100.
